alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 14 at 2:28AM CST until December 14 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WARREN...CLAIBORNE AND NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 228 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rocky Springs, or 17 miles south of Vicksburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Port Gibson, Reganton, Red Lick, Rocky Springs, Church Hill, Hermanville, Pattison, Lorman and Yokena. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for central, southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
